Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to amending the district plan of the Lower East Side business improvement district to modify existing services for the district and to change the method of assessment upon which the district charge is based
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Lower East Side Business Improvement District

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to introduce and pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation which would provide a one hundred dollar tax credit to each taxpayer who adopts a dog or a cat from a shelter.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provide a one hundred dollar tax credit to each taxpayer who adopts a dog or a cat from a shelter.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to amending the district plan of the Lower East Side business improvement district to modify existing services for the district and to change the method of assessment upon which the district charge is based
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Lower East Side Business Improvement District

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to introduce and pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation which would provide a one hundred dollar tax credit to each taxpayer who adopts a dog or a cat from a shelter.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Provide a one hundred dollar tax credit to each taxpayer who adopts a dog or a cat from a shelter.
